title: Rename storefront branding to Kaninwals E Commerce

requirements.text: Rename the website brand to "Kaninwals E Commerce" across the storefront UI and browser metadata, replacing the existing "GlobalMart" branding wherever it is user-visible (e.g., header brand text, footer headings, and the HTML document <title>).

quotes: or website ka name kaninwals e commerce krdo

acceptanceCriteria: Header brand text in StoreLayout shows "Kaninwals E Commerce" instead of "GlobalMart".
Footer text that currently says "About GlobalMart" is updated to "About Kaninwals E Commerce".
frontend/index.html <title> is updated to include "Kaninwals E Commerce" (and no longer uses the generic template title).
No user-facing UI text is introduced in a language other than English.
The app builds successfully and the home page loads without runtime errors after the branding changes.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components are read-only).
Do not edit files listed in frontend.immutablePaths (compose around them instead).
Backend remains a single Motoko actor; do not introduce additional backend services or external databases.
nonGoals: Adding new e-commerce features beyond the existing catalog/cart/checkout/orders/admin capabilities.
Integrating third-party authentication providers other than Internet Identity.
External deployment/hosting configuration outside of the Caffeine/Internet Computer project build output.
